data.title: The Captive Heart
data.meta_description: A cosseted Victorian bride, who yearns for adventure, gets more than she bargained for when her husband is kidnapped by brigands during their honeymoon on the Amalfi coast, and she must learn to fend for herself and find a way to rescue her husband, before...
data.text:
SYNOPSIS

A cosseted Victorian bride, who yearns for adventure, gets more than she bargained for when her husband is kidnapped by brigands during their honeymoon on the Amalfi coast, and she must learn to fend for herself and find a way to rescue her husband, before itâ€™s too late.

Based on a true story.
